item.title: CVE-2018-25046|2024-08-05T12:26:39.631Z -- code.cloudfoundry.org%2Farchiver -- code.cloudfoundry.org%2Farchiver%2Fextractor
item.description: Due to improper path sanitization, archives containing relative file paths can cause files to be written (or overwritten) outside of the target directory.
